Usage: floe [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

  floe - Open platform for building internal data platforms.

Options:
  --version   Show the version and exit.
  -h, --help  Show this message and exit.

Commands:
  artifact    OCI artifact management commands.
  compile     Compile Data Team floe.yaml (FR-040).
  governance  Governance management commands for policy enforcement,...
  helm        Helm chart management commands for floe deployment.
  network     Network security management commands for Kubernetes...
  platform    Platform team commands for governance and deployment.
  rbac        RBAC management commands for Kubernetes security.
  run         Run Data Team pipeline (FR-042).
  sla         SLA compliance reporting commands.
  test        Run dbt tests (FR-043).
  validate    Validate Data Team floe.yaml (FR-041).

  Use 'floe <command> --help' for command-specific help.
